name: SUBWAY CONSTRUCTION SIMULATOR 2017
description:
This is the only one good subway construction simulation game don’t miss it!
Facilitate city traffic and build a subway for urban residents! Use the excavator to dig the holes in which you have to place the roadheader with the crane. After you have drilled the tunnel, place the subway items and connect the stations. You can unlock the option to instantly travel between construction sites using the minimap to avoid the traffic.

Road construction machines:

  • Dump truck:
Standard dump truck for transporting loose material, such as excavated dirt, sand or gravel.


  • Excavator:
Excavator equipped with a standard bucket-head and caterpillar tracks for all-terrain movement.


  • Roadheader:
Boom-type roadheader for heavy-duty tunnel-boring. Comes equipped with a special function spiked head, caterpillar tracks for movement and a conveyor loading mechanism.


  • Mobile crane:
All-terrain mobile crane with 53 meters of main boom and up to 60 meters of cable. Wide range of lifting scenarios from 1 tonne at 75 meters radius up to 200 tonnes at 4 meters radius. Perfect for lifting heavy machinery.


  • Tower crane:
60 meters tall tower crane. You can't move it once you placed it!


Features:

  • realistic, real time tunneling
  • operable tower and mobile crane
  • diverse missions
